game.name: WIZARD PUNKS!!!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stats, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: WIZARD PUNKS!!! is a fast-paced, spell-slinging 4-player local party game. Create spells by combining the four elements of Air, Earth, Fire and Water, and defeat your fellow wizards with a variety of bombastic magics.
